text: Nguye Onenze naba ngabalandeli (babo banandulelayo) emhlabeni, Nabani na ke ongakholwayo kuYe (uAll√¢h) ziya kuba phezu kwakhe iziphumo zokungakholwa kwakhe. Ke kaloku ukungakholwa kwabangakholwayo akubongezeleli nto phambi kwamehlo eNkosi yabo ngaphandle kwenkcaso; kananjalo ukungakholwa kwabangakholwayo akubongezeleli nto ngaphandle kwelahleko
